document_data.name: Sarsae
document_data.genrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220221195407/http://www.candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_1112-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Nov – Dec 2004| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarsae''' was a hardy savory fruit grown and cultivated in [[north Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: Sarsae fruits varied in size, depending on the levels of sunlight. They had tough, spotted green skin that changed color from yellow to white as they ripened. The fruit's hard flesh was yellow-white in color, similar to that of [[apple]]s. It had a tart, almost [[cheese]]-like flavor.
document_data.Usages: Sarsae fruits were used in cooking in similar ways to [[tomato]]s.
